content: I'd be happy to submit a PR around <https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/10289>, though could use some guidance on what you all think is the _expected_ behavior here. I left my personal opinion in the issue, but can see arguments for other behaviors too. @Eric Huss

I don't have a strong opinion on what the expected behavior should be. I would say that maybe a warning should be fine, as that is the behavior of cargo build.

But I would wait until cargo#9576 is finished before making changes here to avoid conflicts.
